header.title: KATUMA
header.slogan: Buy directly from local agro-ecological producers
header.subtitle: Consume local food and participate in a sustainable model with socioeconomic benefits for the community

participate.title: Together we can change the rules of consumption
participate.body: Katuma is born from the need of buying groups and small scale producers to rethink themselves as a way to face together the challenges ahead.

consumption.title: Local food
consumption.body: As a tool to boost the food sovreignty and benefit local producers that do a different kind of farming.

platformcoop.title: Platform Coop
platformcoop.body: People, consumption groups and local producers are the owners and decide the course of the cooperative.

software.title: Free software
software.body: Because we also have digital rights and our project is an open and collective effort.

consumers.title: Consumers
consumers.body: Thanks to a map that geolocalizes and gives visibility to existing groups, we promote people to join, easing the access to an alternative market with local producers

groups.title: Consumers groups
groups.body: The producer keeps his product catalog up to date and the groups he provides to don't need to worry about managing spreadsheets or updating prices.

producers.title: Producers
producers.body: There is no need for sending updated price lists and receiving orders every week in different formats through WhatsApp, email, phone, etc.

open-food-network.title: Joint effort
open-food-network.body: Katuma is affiliate member of Open Food Network, present in Australia, UK, Canada and France among other countries. Katuma's developers are core contributors of the project.

help-us.title: Help us go further
help-us.body: Make your entity become a member and let's join efforts.

header.slogan: A platform to make the scale jump
header.subtitle: Simplify the management of your entity
header.body: Reducing the time we invest in the hard tasks of day to day allows us to focus on what brings value.

orders.subtitle: Orders
orders.title: Forget to close and send the order at night
orders.body: The members of the group place orders from their accounts and the producer can check the order made by the group. You no longer need to send you a spreadsheet.

reports.subtitle: Reports
reports.title: Receive orders in a single format and through a single channel
reports.body: You no longer need to be aware of WhatsApp, email or phone to know which orders you should serve the next week. Check what each group has requested in the orders report.

notifications.subtitle: Notifications
notifications.title: We send you email notifications
notifications.body: There's no need for printing papers anymore. You will receive an order confirmation by email with the details of your purchase.

help-us.title: Help us develop new features
help-us.body: Make your entity become a member and let's join efforts.

sponsors.title: Supported by
sponsors.body: We also thank the 103 people and organizations that made the crowdfunding campaign 'Katuma: Fem fàcil el consum de productes de proximitat' a success.

matchfunding_modal.title: Thank you!
matchfunding_modal.body: These are the 103 people and organizations that supported and made possible the campaign 'Katuma: Fem fàcil el consum de productes de proximitat', through Goteo and financed by Barcelona City Council, become a resounding success. With a goal of 6.000 €, we reached 9.711 €!
